tasks.task_description: Stop Docker metamcp container and systemd service
Verify K8s metamcp connectivity and login

description: Switch to K8s MetaMCP and restore personal database
context: Stopped Docker metamcp and disabled systemd service
Found postgres_db container (stopped), started it on port 15434
Current metamcp_db has 2 users: Janine (company) and jaradd@gmail.com (personal). Need to determine if this should be separated or if it's acceptable mixed data.
Restored personal metamcp database from native PostgreSQL (July 11 data with jaradd@gmail.com user) to docker postgres_db container
K8s MetaMCP pod restarted successfully, health check passing, connected to personal database with 0 MCP servers (clean slate from July 11)
